Il Divo is a multinational classical crossover vocal group created by music manager, executive, and reality TV star Simon Cowell. The group originated in the United Kingdom in December 2003, bringing together singers Urs Buhler (Switzerland), Carlos Marin (Spain), David Miller (United States), and Sébastien Izambard (France).
